title: TechMatrix
comment: M10A - NodeJS API Evaluation Website to help choose hardware components
content: During this project, I learned how to use NodeJS and Express to develop a backend API, and how to make it communicate with a frontend built using React and Vite. I also worked with MongoDB to manage and store the application's data efficiently.

title: My Tasks Secure
comment: M12 - Symfony Evaluation Website for an secured task manager
content: This project is a secure task management web application built with the Symfony framework. It allows users to create, update, delete, and toggle the status of their personal tasks while ensuring proper authentication and authorization.
